Title: Establishes extended producer responsibility for designated products
Summary: Establishes extended producer responsibility for designated products; establishes the extended producer responsibility program fund.
LawCode: Amd Art 27 Art Head, §§27-0101 & 71-1701, add Art 27 Title 16 §§27-1601 - 27-1617, En Con L; add §92-kk, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to establishing an extended producer responsibility program for designated products; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing an extended producer responsibility program fund
